评论详情: They’re so cute and comfy but she wore them twice and o washed twice and they quality did not last. Has little wear blemishes all over already. Very sad

Amazing quality, very comfortable! The color was on point!! Sadly I had to return them bc they were a little to short on my daughter but fit great everywhere else. Sad they don't have more sizes in stock. When they do ill definitely purchase again!

These pants are nice and soft. I weigh 60 pounds and I’m 4’6”. They do pill after a few washes, but otherwise they’re nicely made. They aren’t quite silky, but they aren’t fully cotton like a typical yoga pant. I like that these aren’t fitted to my leg. They are slightly long for me (I have a 24” inseam if that helps others).
Daughter loves these. She is very narrow.
Daughter loves them but the NB logo on leg started coming off after second wash :/
Appreciate the opportunity to do business, received what was ordered with quick shipping. Thank you!!

The material is very soft and stretchy. The size 7/8 fits my almost 8 year old well. The pants are a little long but with shoes on they are fine. The purple/dark-gray color is nice and will go with anything.
The pants fit well.  Length and waist size as advertised.
